column4: there any way to roll back from 9.04 back to 8.10 from a shell? i updated and vmware fusion is not playing nice
when i boot up into X, i don't get a mouse and keyboard
tried copying the xorg.conf from a 8.10 install to try and fix, reinstalled vmware-tools, all to no avail
also did a dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg, no lucks
that was going to be my next suggestion,
lemme take a peek, thanks for the help
no go :( i might just start from scratch
do you have your /home partition separate?
that should make reinstalling and reconfiguring easier, perhaps think about doing that
yea, was dreading but really wouldn't loose that much
since i got a shell can just trans over
yeah, I wish I knew about your problem more to help you
